title: Smoked salmon with Asian dressing
directions:
Mix the ingredients for the dressing.
It will keep in the fridge overnight,
although the flavours will get hotter
as the chilli sits in the liquid.

To serve, arrange the salmon on plates
– it works out at about 3 slices per person.
Mix the avocado, cucumber and coriander,
then pile or scatter on top. Spoon over
a little of the dressing and serve.
ingredients: 2 large just-ripe avocados, peeled, stoned and diced
1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
